channel.title: Firemaking Disabled? [PI] Rep++
channel.description:
[i]i have a few questions, how would i change the amount of points a player receives after a pest control game? atm its [i]5[/i] points and i want to change it to [i]10[/i], im not sure but i think its somewhere in client.java?[/i]--Fixed
[b]And also, i asked this before but never got a answer, on this PI server i downloaded i believe its called Exion or something like that, when you try to light a fire i get this message [i]"Firemaking is Disabled"[/i] how and where would i go to fix that? i thought it would be like in the skill file but i was wrong?[/b]
[i]And also.. I want to change the bonus of Ags, atm its [i]132[/i], i want to change it to [i]200[/i], how and where would i go for that? Fixed Rep++[/i]-

item.title: Firemaking Disabled? [PI] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

you will have to code that in like most project insanity tbh i see why they did it but i see why they didnt do it.

  1. They didnt add it because its firemaking its a useless skill people only do it because its another 99 stat to get.
  2. But people that add it actually want a good server for people to get every skill work and for so they can use the fire to cook but most servers will have a range.

So you will have to find it or make it to after use item on object to make ur character move East or unless u want it to make a different way but create a object in that spot. =p

Read full topic

item.title: Firemaking Disabled? [PI] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

[quote=“99matt99, post:13, topic:367733”]go to
src-server-model-items-use items

press ctrl+f and search for

//c.getFiremaking().checkLogType(itemUsed, useWith);

remove the // to make it

c.getFiremaking().checkLogType(itemUsed, useWith);

then the message is below it

c.sendMessage("Firemaking is disabled.");

you should make it

//c.sendMessage("Firemaking is disabled.");

hope this helped[/quote]
No i had pc fixed, but with that firemaking one you said before, it did enable it, however, the fire doesn’t show, and it takes like 5 seconds for it to light even tho it shows no fire or log :s

Read full topic

item.title: Firemaking Disabled? [PI] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

guessing u need help with pc still? didnt see it lol well for the pc u go to

src-server-model-minigame

and search for

c.pcPoints +=

it should have 5 after that change it to 10 then.

for the send message should be above it and should look like

c.sendMessage("You have won the pest control game and have been awarded 5 pest control points.");

change the 5 to 10 and ur players should now receive 10points and they can be informed =p

Read full topic

item.title: Firemaking Disabled? [PI] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

go to
src-server-model-items-use items

press ctrl+f and search for

//c.getFiremaking().checkLogType(itemUsed, useWith);

remove the // to make it

c.getFiremaking().checkLogType(itemUsed, useWith);

then the message is below it

c.sendMessage("Firemaking is disabled.");

you should make it

//c.sendMessage("Firemaking is disabled.");

hope this helped

Read full topic

item.title: Firemaking Disabled? [PI] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

[quote=“getstabbed, post:9, topic:367733”]Firemaking disabled is in useitem.java
Do ctrl + f for it and then delete everything in that section.[/quote]You can’t delete it.

It says it was disabled as Sanity became lazy before releasing, and never handled Firemaking.

He only made it to where any log + tinderbox = “Firemaking has been disabled.”

You have to add it yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Firemaking Disabled? [PI] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

[quote=“recker450, post:6, topic:367733”]is there like a file call pestcontrol.java?
if not try finding the message
of the ending of pest control
for example if this was your ending message
“you have completed pest control and was awarded 5 pc points.”
you should find that message and somewhere near it it would be like
example:
pcpoints += 5;[/quote]Thank you, there was a pest control file Edit: cant rep you need to wait 168 hours

Still need help with Firemaking!

Read full topic

item.title: Firemaking Disabled? [PI] Rep++

is there like a file call pestcontrol.java?
if not try finding the message
of the ending of pest control
for example if this was your ending message
“you have completed pest control and was awarded 5 pc points.”
you should find that message and somewhere near it it would be like
example:
pcpoints += 5;

item.title: Firemaking Disabled? [PI] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

i have a few questions, how would i change the amount of points a player receives after a pest control game? atm its 5 points and i want to change it to 10, im not sure but i think its somewhere in client.java?–Fixed

And also, i asked this before but never got a answer, on this PI server i downloaded i believe its called Exion or something like that, when you try to light a fire i get this message “Firemaking is Disabled” how and where would i go to fix that? i thought it would be like in the skill file but i was wrong?

And also… I want to change the bonus of Ags, atm its 132, i want to change it to 200, how and where would i go for that? Fixed
Rep++-

Read full topic
